com.danielly.jsf.cinema.dao.interfaces

Interface MovieDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovieDaoImpl

    public interface MovieDao
    MovieDao is an Interface class which has all the methods to query the movies table in the Database.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gil Danielly
